akn:subsection.akn:heading: Minimum Standards for Testing and Fitness.—

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Secretary of Transportation shall prescribe regulations on minimum standards for testing and ensuring the fitness of an individual operating a commercial motor vehicle. The regulations—
